thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: News Corp’s Murdoch Urges Facebook to Pay Publishers for Content

author: Lukas I. Alpert
title: News Corp’s Murdoch Urges Facebook to Pay Publishers for Content

organizations.name: murdoch urges facebook to pay publishers for content news corp

text:
News Corp Executive Chairman Rupert Murdoch said if Facebook Inc. is serious about promoting “trusted content” and filtering fake news out of its news feed, it should pay publishers fees similar to those cable distributors pay to television channels.
Mr. Murdoch’s comments on Monday follow Facebook’s announcement last week that it plans to rank news sources based on credibility, part of its efforts to rein in false information on its platform. 
...
